description.p: A printer error can occur if a Report is defined using a specific printer that does not exist.

discussion.p: A default printer can be assigned to a report when designing reports. If the printer is not available to Alpha Anywhere when the report is run, the following error can occur:

figure.title: Printer error: preview - hdcPrn is NULL.

description.p: To resolve this error, you must do one of the following:

item.name: Change the report to use the Default Printer.

Specify an explicit printer that exists and can be accessed by the system generating the report. Do *[not]* choose the built-in AlphaFive printers as these are virtual printers used for PDF generation.
